name: The Life of a Fly (with a gun)
name_original: The Life of a Fly (with a gun)
description:
You are a fly....with a gun. Your goal is to kill as many spiders and collect their spider eggs. You can collect them and upgrade yourself in the shop. Compete with your friends to be at the top of the leaderboard!

ATTENTION: USE THE WASD KEYS, NOT THE ARROW KEYS OR IT WON'T WORK.
